It's time to say goodbye to the up-dates that Rin Hashisako and Mei Yamazaki have been sharing with you. We've watched a lot of videos this time, and I, Mei Yamazaki, saw the video of Miki Nonaka's vocal recording, and I was so impressed by the way she recorded it.
I hope I can sing as expressively as Ms. Nonaka from now on.
I, Hashisako, was impressed by Yume Kudo's vocal recording.
I was so impressed by Yume Kudo's vocal recording.
I guess it's like this... I tend to worry about pitch and lyrics when I record for the first time, but she sang without worrying about it.
But I felt like it was really great to be able to sing as much as I wanted without worrying about the pitch or the lyrics.
UpCami takes you behind the scenes of the production of various artists belonging to the UpFront Group.
Please subscribe to our channel to get a glimpse into the behind-the-scenes of the production of various artists belonging to the Upfront Group.
This time, up-cam's partners are Rin Hashisako of Angerme and Mei Yamazaki of Morning Musume。 24's Mei Yamazaki. Good bye!
